annotation.spannedText: that vaccination does not equal immunization

classMention.mentionClass: that vaccination does not equal immunization

annotation.spannedText: it is pro-vaccine awareness, namely, making the public aware of vaccine failures and the growing plight of the countless vaccine injured around the world

classMention.mentionClass: it is pro-vaccine awareness, namely, making the public aware of vaccine failures and the growing plight of the countless vaccine injured around the world

annotation.spannedText: all this does is to increase the public's suspicion of the real agenda behind their ostensibly charitable plea to save the poor and the needy from the hell of disease, instead of focusing on improving their most basic living conditions, nutrition, sanitation, refrigeration, etc., and making inroads to reduce the geopolitical violence that is ruining the lives of hundreds of millions

annotation.spannedText: You can't vaccinate away conditions that lead to compromised immunity

classMention.mentionClass: You can't vaccinate away conditions that lead to compromised immunity

annotation.spannedText: nor can you 'immunize' folks -- especially parents -- against the desire to pursue the truth about vaccines
